free: #e The rooster crowed. One day, there was a farmer who went to the farmland to work.
#c 雞啼。有一天，有一個農夫到田裡工作。
#n mi-’aw’aw ku wacu: 狗叫
#n ma-lingad-ay 農夫
#n ma-tayal-ay 工人
#n ma-tayal 工作
#n mi-tayal-an 做過的事情
#n ‘adihay=tu ku mi-tayal-an nira 他做的很多
#n marurayen=tu kaku 我覺得很累
#n maruray kaku 我很累
#e His work was pick fruits.
#c 他的工作是摘水果的。
#n mi-pitpit-an a heci 用手摘的水果
#n mi-tukung-an a heci 用竹竿採的水果
#e His fruits were plenty.
#c 他的果實纍纍。
#e He prepared three baskets for holding the fruits, so he went to the farmland to pick (fruits).
#c 他準備三個簍筐，準備用來要裝果實的，所以他去田裡摘。
#n sa- 表示工具
#n sa-pi-patala 準備要...的東西
#n mi-patala cira tu ccay falud a nanum, sa-patala nira tu lafang 他準備一打水，準備要給客人喝。
#e He climbed up the ladder to pick fruits.
#c 他爬樓梯去摘果樹。
#e He put (the fruits) in (the bag) that he had prepared to hold the fruits.
#c 他放置在他前面準備裝水果的(袋子)。
#e His toil of picking fruits is reminiscent of our toil as farmers, like the farmers in our village.
#c 他摘水果的辛苦，使我想起我們農夫的辛苦，很像在我們部落的農夫一樣。
#e Before long, (after) he finished picking the fruits, he put them in his basket.
#c 沒多久，他摘完之後，裝到他的簍筐去。
#n pa-tayra-en=tu ni ina ku wawa i pitilidan 媽媽把小孩送到學校去。
#e He put them (in the baskets), but the three baskets didn’t seem to be full. (Only) two were full.
#c 他裝起來，看起來三個簍筐都沒有滿，只有裝滿兩個。
#e So he climbed up the tree again to pick fruits.
#c 所以重新爬到樹上去，繼續摘果實。
#e He was picking fruits.
#c 他正在摘果實。
#e There was a man pulling a goat along; (he) passed the tree where he picked fruits.
#c 有個男人牽一隻羊，經過他摘果實的樹下。
#e When he was picking fruits, the goat looked around and wanted to eat the fruits.
#c 當他摘果實的時候，羊東張西望，想吃水果。
#n sa-ka-k<um>a’en-an 想吃
#n losay水果樹(總稱) heci nu losay 水果
#e The goat passed the tree where (he) picked fruits.
#c 羊經過了摘果實的樹。
#e There was a child riding a bike; (the child) passed the tree where he picked fruits.
#c 又有一位年輕的小孩騎腳踏車，經過他摘果實的樹。
#e The child saw the fruits and wanted to take them.
#c 小孩看見那個水果，想拿。
#n mi-ala kaku tu ccay a cudad 我拿了一本書
#e He put his bike by the side.
#c 他把腳踏車停放在他旁邊。
#e He looked at the farmer, (but the farmer) didn’t see him.
#c 他望著那個農夫，(但農夫)沒有看他。
#e (He) wanted to steal one (basket) and looked around.
#c (他)想偷一(簍)，東張西望。
#n mi-takaw kaku tu paysu nira 我偷了他的錢。
#e The farmer didn’t see him.
#c 那個農夫沒有看他。
#e So he thought, 'If I take one basket, maybe he won’t see it.'
#c 所以他想，「我抬一筐的水果，說不定他不會看到。」
#e He took one basket and hung it on his bike, leaving quickly.
#c 他拿了一簍筐，掛在他的腳踏車上，很快(從樹下)經過，跑掉。
#n pakafit：掛,黏,貼 附在上面
#n pateli：放置
#e He left delightedly.
#c 他暗中自喜地離開。
#n lipahak kaku ira kisu tayni milisu’ i takuwanan 我很高興你來看我。
#e He saw a young girl ahead. He saw (her and thought she was) beautiful.
#c 前面看見一個年輕的小女孩，他看了非常漂亮。
#e He looked around and turned round to see, falling from his bike halfway.
#c 看來看去，回頭望一望，在路途中騎腳踏車跌倒。
#e After he fell down, all the fruits fell off.
#c 跌倒之後，果實全部傾倒出來了。
#n ma-’emin tayni ku pulong a tamdaw：全部的人都來了。
#n ma-’emin aku ma-nanum ku nanum：我把水全喝光了。
#n ma-’emin awa-ay=tu ku kulisiw：全部的腳踏車都不見了。
#e He looked at his foot, which was bleeding.
#c 他看他的腳，流血。
#e He thought, ‘What should I do?’
#c 他想，我怎麼辦？
#n maan sa=tu 怎麼辦
#n sa’an 心裡如此想
#e He looked up. There were three children helping him pick up the fruits.
#c 他抬頭望，有三個年輕的小孩幫他撿拾水果。
#e The child (who stole the fruits) felt lighthearted.
#c 那個小孩(偷東西的那個)感到很輕鬆。
#e ‘Ah, the three children helped me,’ he thought.
#c 啊，那三個小孩幫助我，他這麼想。
#e After he was done, he helped the three children put the basket on (the bike).
#c 完了以後，他幫忙三個小孩把籃子裝在(腳踏車)上面。
#e The he left.
#c 然後他離開了。
#e He saw the three children go by.
#c 他看見那三個小孩經過。
#e The hat fell onto the ground, and one of the children picked it up.
#c 帽子掉到地上，一個小孩把它撿起來。
#e He blew and turned around to see, returning the hat to the rider.
#c 他吹，回頭看，把帽子還給騎腳踏車的。
#n mi-caliw 借
#e The child who stole the fruits thought, ‘Ah, the children were so kind.’
#c 那個偷水果的小孩想：「唉呀，這三個小孩那麼好。」
#e He gave some fruits to the three children, and each had one fruit.
#c 他給三個小孩水果，每個人各一個水果
#n ala-ccay 一個人一個
#e Then, the children left.
#c 之後小孩就離開了。
#e Then, the old person, the farmer thought, ‘(the baskets) are full.I could come down,’ he thought.
#c 後來，那個老人，那個農夫認為，「那個(籃子)摘水果的滿了，我可以下來了。」他這樣想。
#e He looked at his baskets, only two left.
#c 他看他的籃子，只剩兩(籃)。
#e Only one was full.
#c 那個裝滿的，只剩一個。
#e 'Where were the fruits that I picked?'
#c 「我摘的水果到哪裡去了呢？」
#e He looked around, (seeing) the three friends/children went by  eating fruits.
#c (他)望來望去，(看到)剛才的三個朋友/小孩經過果樹底下，在吃水果。
#e The old man was looking at the three children, thinking, ‘Is it these three people (that stole my fruits)?’
#c 那老人家看那三個小孩，想來想去，「這三個人嗎？」
#e The three children went by.
#c 那三個小孩路過。
#e I’m done with my story.
#c 沒有了，我的故事只有這樣。
